definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The results showed that the reflectivities varied during the wound healing process.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示激光照射剂量对伤口组织的反射率影响不大。

sentences.english: The dosages of two drugs were adjusted according to blood pressure change.
sentences.chinese: 根据血压控制情况调整两组的降压药剂量。

sentences.english: Thus, high-dose rate after-loading intracavitary therapy can be used to replace conventional radium therapy.
sentences.chinese: 所以高剂量率后装治疗可以代替常规镭疗。

sentences.english: A full-body CT scan gives a radiation dose of 20-30 millisieverts.
sentences.chinese: 一次全身CT扫描的辐射剂量是20～30毫希弗。

sentences.english: The first test they did was with a virus dose of one nanogram.
sentences.chinese: 他们做先将1纳克剂量的病毒做为实验的第一步。

sentences.english: The development of this condition is directly related to the length of time a patient is taking metoclopramide and the number of doses taken.
sentences.chinese: 病情的进展与患者服用胃复安的时间和剂量成正相关。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of different doses of astragalus in cats.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察不同剂量的黄芪对猫正常血压的影响。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照剂量和居民的恶性肿瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 请问初次用避孕药“优思明”，可否自行减小剂量？

sentences.english: And the extents of above changes were positively correlated with dosing of the insufflated lung surfactant.
sentences.chinese: 上述改变幅度与喷注的肺表面活性物质的剂量正相关。

sentences.english: Additionally, a certain correlation appears between its antipruritic effect and the dose of drug.
sentences.chinese: 其止痒作用与剂量有一定的相关性。

sentences.english: When the ovary maturation coefficient was high, the dosages of exogenous hormone should be lower and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 而性腺成就系数较小者，其外源激素的剂量宜大些。

sentences.english: Then, the low dose effects and roentgenography interval were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了低剂量效应与造影的间隔时间。

sentences.english: PCP can make one nearly impervious to pain at high doses.
sentences.chinese: 在高剂量的情况下，PCP可以让人失去痛感。

sentences.english: We firstly obtained the depth distribution of total dose inside satellite.
sentences.chinese: 取得了卫星内部的总剂量深度分布结果。

sentences.english: The dehydration rate was increased by adding the dosage of desiccants.
sentences.chinese: 干燥剂剂量愈大，种子失水速度愈快。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician
delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
